Plot: Fernando, a journalist, and his friend César join terrorist group MR8 in order to fight Brazilian dictatorial regime during the late sixties. Cesare, however, is wounded and captured during...
Title: Four Days in September
Actors: Alan Arkin, Fernanda Torres, Pedro Cardoso, Luiz Fernando Guimarães
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
